property.name: dfs.name.dir
property.description: Path on the local filesystem where the NameNode stores the namespace and transactions logs persistently.

property.name: dfs.data.dir
property.description: Comma separated list of paths on the local filesystem of a DataNode where it should store its blocks.

property.name: dfs.namenode.plugins
property.description: Comma-separated list of namenode plug-ins to be activated.

property.name: dfs.datanode.plugins
property.description: Comma-separated list of datanode plug-ins to be activated.
